monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Allows the player to swim - Unaffected by water streams
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Debuff effects and effects of negative stacks are reduced by 50%.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Channeling Balance
skills.description: Unique Aura: Channel Buff also increases the damage dealt by 6% and reduces the damage taken by 6%.

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Curse Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects and effects of negative stacks are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fish Scales
skills.description: Aura: When an allied Aquatic Monster is hit, 35% chance to inflict a Bleed stack onto the attacker equal to the damage received.

skills.name: Full Potential
skills.description: Shield target for 25% of target's Max Health Applies Might, Sorcery, Regeneration, Sidekick, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Initial Poison
skills.description: Apply Poison (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Mass Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 15% less damage from Multi-Target-Attacks.

skills.name: Mega Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield all for 3 x (250 + 30% Defense)

skills.name: Multi Poison
skills.description: Aura: Poison (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Poison Eater
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Poison Eater Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Poison Glands
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Poison on the attacker.

skills.name: Poisoned Nerves
skills.description: Unique Aura: Poison (Debuff) also reduces enemy's Mana Regeneration by 10%.

skills.name: Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 3 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 2
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 4 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 3
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 5 x (90 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 4
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 6 x (100 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 5
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 7 x (130 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Recover
skills.description: Heals 10% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Reflect
skills.description: When getting attacked, reflect 40% (20% in Keeper Battles) of the damage back to the attacker. (Reflected damage isn't affected by any modifiers)

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description: Every time this Monster takes a hit, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Safecast
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Safecast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Safecast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Spiky Defense
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Armor Break on the attacker.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: When an ally would be attacked, 25% chance to redirect the attack to this Monster. (In PvP, redirecting monster takes 15% increased damage)

skills.name: Tidal Wave
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (water) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Tidal Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Tidal Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Toxic Slam
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxin
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Tsunami
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies Removes 2 Buffs from targets

skills.name: Water Surge
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (water) applies Might (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Water Surge Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (water) applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%

drops.name: Crystal Shard
drops.description: Teleports you back to the Keepers' Stronghold
